Class.name: i2.cust.cav.approval
Class.Description:
Souhlas uzivatele s podminkami pro zobrazeni fulltextu

19.07.24 ln; dusledne pouzity makra GETICTX a IPREF
14.02.13 jk; vymazan template()
23.10.12 tt; zalozena trida

Method.name: userData
Method.Description:
Uzivatelska data pro HTML sablonu stranky
slouzi pro odchylky
Method.Implementation:
s idx=$$$GETREQVAR("idx") s data("IDX")=idx s repo=$$$GETREQVAR("repo") s data("REPO")=repo s key=$$$GETREQVAR("key") s data("KEY")=key s sT001=$p($p($p(data("IDX"),"*","2"),"*","1"),"#","1")
s data("ODREC")=##class(i2.html.tpl).getPermalink2($$$GETICTX_"_un_epca*"_sT001,..tx("RECORD"))
s maintain=##class(content.approval).getPageID() s data("MAINTAIN")=##class(i2.html.tpl).getLink(maintain,"idx="_idx)
